title: Bullish Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - SLYV - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the SPDR S&P 600 Small Cap Value ETF (Symbol: SLYV) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $59.78, changing hands as high as $59.86 per share. SPDR S&P 600 Small Cap Value shares are currently trading up about 3% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of SLYV shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, SLYV's low point in its 52 week range is $50.55 per share, with $70.49 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $59.96.
